mapper.select: select e.mateid, e.memid, m.memname from mate e, member m where e.memid=#{e.memId} and e.MATEID=m.MEMID
select memId from mate where memid=#{memId}
select DISTINCT r.memid, r.memname, r.memgrade, e.mateid from member r, mate e where e.mateid=#{e.mateId} and e.mateid=r.memid
select memid, memname, memgrade from member where memid=#{memId}
